title: Gluten free cream of wild mushroom soup
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '450g assorted wild mushrooms, thinly sliced', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2 portobello mushrooms, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '4 tablespoons dry white wine', '700ml gluten-free chicken stock', '235ml whipping cream', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, divided', '1 tablespoon gluten-free plain flour', 'sea salt and ground white pepper to taste']
